title: Linear Algebra Toolbox – Matrix Calculator, Determinant, Rank & System Solver

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \[ A x = b, \] where \(A\) is an \(n \times n\) matrix of coefficients, \(x\) is the unknown vector, and \(b\) is the right-hand-side vector.
